news_header: A US company reveals a flying car concept with pre-orders and plans for production within a year.
news_original_title: Watch: A real-life flying car takes to the skies
news_text: Alef Aeronautics has unveiled a concept flying car capable of vertical take-off, with CEO Jim Dukhovny announcing thousands of pre-orders and plans to begin production within a year. Priced around $300,000, the electric vehicle boasts an airborne range of 110 km but only accommodates one and a half passengers. The company faces significant technological and regulatory challenges, similar to others in the flying car market. Meanwhile, advancements in AI and robotics are also making headlines, with various projects exploring their potential impacts across industries.
